name: Allure Queen LV3
effectText: Once per turn: You can target 1 Level 3 or lower monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card as an Equip Spell (max. 1). If this card would be destroyed by battle, destroy that equipped monster, instead. During your Standby Phase: You can send this card equipped with a monster by this card's effect to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Allure Queen LV5" from your hand or Deck.
